alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Outagamie; Portage; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 9:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, southeastern Marathon, Menominee, northwestern Winnebago, Waushara, Waupaca, central Oconto, northwestern Outagamie and Shawano Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 940 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Bevent to Amherst to 6 miles northeast of Friendship. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail and brief torrential downpours. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Shawano, Waupaca, Wautoma, Weston, New London, Clintonville, Whiting, Bevent and Wittenberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding on area roads, so motorists should use caution.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Outagamie; Portage; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago
